name: Not a Detective
description:
[Content warning: suicide mentioned]

You work as a crime scene cleaner; your job is to clean up the aftermath of crime scenes and biohazards. You are being sent on your first job alone, it should be easy as long as you stay on task and don't let your curiosity take over. Remember, your a crime scene cleaner, not a detective.

There are 3 main types of ending with several paths to each.
